description: This file defines a React functional component for a login page, including focus management, form inputs, and UI layout.

methods.name: Login
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form with focus management.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles the form submission event, currently as a placeholder that shows an alert.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles key down events to trigger login button click on Enter key.
